trans-unit.source: Provides <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref>, predefined <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref> format names.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""> </xref>、 預先定義<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>格式名稱。

trans-unit.source: Use them to identify the format of data that you store in an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 使用它們來識別您存放的資料格式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> classes also use the `static` format list to determine the type of data that is retrieved from the system <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>, or that is transferred in a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>類別也會使用`static`格式清單，以判斷從系統擷取的資料型別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>，或可轉移拖放作業中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.GetFormat%2A> method allows you to: - Get a predefined <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format> object for a format name or ID number.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.GetFormat%2A>方法可讓您:-取得預先定義<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format>格式名稱或識別碼的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.GetFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Add a new format name/ID number pair to the `static` list in this class, and to register the format with the Windows registry as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> format when you pass it the format name.
trans-unit.target: 新增使用新格式名稱/識別碼數字組`static`清單在此類別中，以及向 Windows 登錄中，以註冊格式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>格式化時傳遞的格式名稱。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: You can get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format.Id%2A> number or format <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format.Name%2A> from the appropriate property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format> instance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format.Id%2A>數目或格式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format.Name%2A>中適當的屬性從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format>執行個體。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format.Id%2A>

trans-unit.target: 指定的 Windows 點陣圖格式。

trans-unit.source: A bitmap represents a computer graphic as an array of bits in memory, and these bits represent the attributes of the individual pixels in an image.
trans-unit.target: 點陣圖表示電腦圖形為記憶體中的位元陣列，而這些位元代表屬性的映像中的個別像素。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Windows enhanced metafile format.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Windows 增強型中繼檔格式。

trans-unit.source: This <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref>欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The metafile format is a Windows file that stores an image in terms of graphic objects rather than pixels.
trans-unit.target: 中繼檔格式是儲存影像的圖形物件，而不是像素為單位的 Windows 檔案。

trans-unit.source: When resized, a metafile preserves an image better than a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 重新調整大小時，中繼檔將保存優於點陣圖的影像。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 特殊考量可能需要使用剪貼簿的中繼檔格式時。

trans-unit.source: Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format.
trans-unit.target: 因為在目前的實作限制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>類別，.NET Framework 所使用的中繼檔格式可能無法辨識的應用程式使用較舊的中繼檔格式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs).
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您必須與 Win32 剪貼簿應用程式開發介面 (Api) 的互通。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see article 323530, "Metafiles on Clipboard Are Not Visible to All Applications," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文章 323530，"中繼檔上剪貼簿是不可見到所有應用程式，「 Microsoft 知識庫中在 http://support.microsoft.com。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format> with the Windows Clipboard numeric ID and name for the specified ID.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format>使用 Windows 剪貼簿的數值識別碼和名稱指定的識別碼。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format>

trans-unit.source: This member is typically used to register native Clipboard formats.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員通常用來註冊原生的剪貼簿格式。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.GetFormat%2A> with an ID number when you want to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format> instance that contains the ID/format name pair.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.GetFormat%2A>，當您想要擷取的識別碼<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format>包含格式識別碼/名稱組的執行個體。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.GetFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the ID name and number is published by the creator of the application that you are using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> to interface with.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您所使用的應用程式的建立者所發行的識別碼名稱和號碼<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>介面。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: For example, the ID number for Dynamic Data Exchange (DDE) conversation information in Visual Basic is `&HBF00`, and the format name is `vbCFLink`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Visual Basic 中的動態資料交換 (DDE) 交談資訊的識別碼是`&HBF00`，且格式名稱是`vbCFLink`。

trans-unit.source: Call this method with any unique ID number to add the ID/format name pair to the `static` list of format name/ID pairs in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats> class.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法將格式識別碼/名稱組加入任何唯一識別碼`static`清單的格式名稱/識別碼組<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>

trans-unit.source: The new name will be created by concatenating "Format" and the ID number.
trans-unit.target: 藉由串連"Format"及識別碼，將會建立新的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This pair is not registered as a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> format because you have not provided a name.
trans-unit.target: 此組未註冊為新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>格式化，因為您未提供的名稱。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: The format ID.
trans-unit.target: 格式的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format> that has the Windows Clipboard numeric ID and the name of the format.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format>有 Windows 剪貼簿的數值識別碼和格式的名稱。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format> with the Windows Clipboard numeric ID and name for the specified format.

trans-unit.source: Call GetFormat with the format name when you need a Windows Clipboard numeric ID for an existing format.
trans-unit.target: 當您需要 Windows 剪貼簿的數值識別碼的現有格式時，請呼叫 GetFormat 的格式名稱。

trans-unit.source: Call this method with your own format name to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> format type.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法與您自己的格式名稱來建立新的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類型的格式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: If the specified format does not exist, this method will register the name as a Clipboard format with the Windows registry and get a unique format identifier.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的格式不存在，這個方法會註冊為使用 Windows 登錄的剪貼簿格式的名稱，並取得獨特格式的識別項。

trans-unit.source: This new name/ID pair will be added to the `static` list of format name/ID pairs in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats> class.
trans-unit.target: 將加入這個新的名稱/識別碼組`static`清單的格式名稱/識別碼組<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Windows metafile format, which Windows Forms does not directly use.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Windows 中繼檔格式，Windows Form 並不直接使用。

trans-unit.source: This <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref>欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The metafile format is a Windows file that stores an image in terms of graphic objects rather than pixels.
trans-unit.target: 中繼檔格式是儲存影像的圖形物件，而不是像素為單位的 Windows 檔案。

trans-unit.source: When resized, a metafile preserves an image better than a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 重新調整大小時，中繼檔將保存優於點陣圖的影像。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 特殊考量可能需要使用剪貼簿的中繼檔格式時。

trans-unit.source: Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format.
trans-unit.target: 因為在目前的實作限制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>類別，.NET Framework 所使用的中繼檔格式可能無法辨識的應用程式使用較舊的中繼檔格式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs).
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您必須與 Win32 剪貼簿應用程式開發介面 (Api) 的互通。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see article 323530, "Metafiles on Clipboard Are Not Visible to All Applications," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文章 323530，"中繼檔上剪貼簿是不可見到所有應用程式，「 Microsoft 知識庫中在 http://support.microsoft.com。

trans-unit.source: A symbolic link is a disk directory entry that takes the place of a directory entry for a file, but is actually a reference to a file in a different directory.
